mapper.select: SELECT cart_id, users_id, product_id, product_name, cart_count, product_price, product_image, product_imagePath FROM cart, users, product ORDER BY cart_id ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cart_id, users_id, product_id, product_name, cart_count, product_price, product_image, product_imagePath) VALUES(#{cart_id}, #{users_id} , #{product_id},#{product_name},#{cart_count},#{product_price},#{product_image})
